snippet: The founder of Poly Implant Prothèse got four years in prison for selling hundreds of thousands of defective implants in more than 65 countries.
abstract: French court sentences Jean-Claude Mas, founder of Poly Implant Prothese, to four years in prison for selling hundreds of thousands of defective breast implants in more than 65 countries.
lead_paragraph: The founder of Poly Implant Prothèse got four years in prison for selling hundreds of thousands of defective implants in more than 65 countries.

headline.main: Defective Breast Implant Sales Draw Prison Term for French Executive
